title: Patch Notes
content: ust liked the cut of your jib. Fixed a bug sometimes preventing you from resting or fast travelling after escaping from the Last Light prison. Minthara no longer lingers as a follower if she dies while trying to escape Moonrise Towers with you. Companions will once more comment on witnessing the Apostle of Myrkul. Fixed a bug related to breaking Wulbren et al. out of Moonrise Towers, where jumping back into the Oubliette would cause the prisoners to appear dead even if you saved them. Also fixed
